troubleSolution.title: Hub is not detecting connected devices

troubleSymptom.p: The smart home hub is not detecting connected devices.

cause.p: The hub is out of range, the device is not compatible, or the hub firmware is outdated.

step.cmd: Move the smart device closer to the hub and try again.
Check that the device supports the same protocol (e.g., Zigbee or Z-Wave).
Update the hub’s firmware from the settings menu.

troubleSolution.title: Hub is not connecting to the Wi-Fi network

troubleSymptom.p: The hub is not connecting to the Wi-Fi network.

cause.p: The Wi-Fi password has changed, the signal is weak, or the hub only supports 2.4 GHz networks.

step.cmd: Make sure you’re using the correct Wi-Fi password.
Place the hub closer to the router.
Check if your network is 2.4 GHz, not 5 GHz.
